message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I believe will be a great asset to you. I'm asking for $12,000 for it.  Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thanks for offering!  $12,000 is a bit steep for me. Would you consider $8,000?

Bob, I appreciate your interest! While $8,000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, I'm willing to come down to $10,500. This is still a fair price for the value this product will bring you. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, I'm glad we are getting closer. I could do $9,000.  Let me know if that works for you.
